title: Última Saudade - Ao Vivo
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Eu admiro cê mandar essa mensagem
lines.translation: I admire you for sending this message.
lines.grammar: Verbs: admiro, mandar. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'I admire you for sending this message.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Tem que ter cara pra falar o que cê falou
lines.translation: You have to have guts to say what you said.
lines.grammar: Verbs: ter, falar, falou. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'You have to have guts to say what you said.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Tem que ter peito pra achar que tem direito
lines.translation: You have to have guts to think you have a right.
lines.grammar: Verbs: ter, peito, achar. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'You have to have guts to think you have a right.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: De começar uma conversa me chamando de amor
lines.translation: To start a conversation by calling me "love".
lines.grammar: Verbs: começar, chamando. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'To start a conversation by calling me "love".'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Cê tá achando que minha vida é um filme
lines.translation: You think my life is a movie?
lines.grammar: Verbs: achando. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'You think my life is a movie?'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Que pausa e depois volta de onde parou?
lines.translation: What pause, and then what if we pick up where we left off?
lines.grammar: Verbs: depois, parou. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'What pause, and then what if we pick up where we left off?'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: O relógio roda igual pra todo mundo
lines.translation: The clock runs the same for everyone.
lines.grammar: Verbs: relógio, todo, mundo. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'The clock runs the same for everyone.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E numa dessas rodadas você rodou
lines.translation: And in one of those rounds you were eliminated.
lines.grammar: Verbs: dessas, rodadas, rodou. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'And in one of those rounds you were eliminated.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E cê nem reparou
lines.translation: And you didn't even notice.
lines.grammar: Verbs: reparou. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'And you didn't even notice.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: No quê?
lines.translation: In what?
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'In what?'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Que se eu ligar pra minha última saudade
lines.translation: What if I call my last longing?
lines.grammar: Verbs: ligar. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'What if I call my last longing?'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Seu telefone não toca
lines.translation: Your phone isn't ringing.
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Your phone isn't ringing.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Já tem uns três, quatro amores na frente
lines.translation: She already has three or four loves ahead of her.
lines.grammar: Verbs: quatro, amores. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'She already has three or four loves ahead of her.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Com prioridade de volta
lines.translation: With priority return
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: com (with); de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'With priority return'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Se eu falar de ex pela rua
lines.translation: If I talk about my ex in the street
lines.grammar: Verbs: falar. Prepositions/case: de + article contracts (do/da/dos/das). Meaning: 'If I talk about my ex in the street'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Sua orelha nem coça
lines.translation: His ear doesn't even itch.
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'His ear doesn't even itch.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Tem amor na vida que marca
lines.translation: There is love in life that leaves a mark.
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'There is love in life that leaves a mark.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Tem amor que passa, e cê passou faz horas
lines.translation: Some love fades, and you left hours ago.
lines.grammar: Verbs: passou, horas. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Some love fades, and you left hours ago.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Desculpa minha sinceridade
lines.translation: Excuse my frankness.
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Excuse my frankness.'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Mas respondendo sua mensagem
lines.translation: But in response to your message
lines.grammar: Verbs: respondendo. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'But in response to your message'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: Não, hoje a gente não volta (hoje não)
lines.translation: No, we're not going back today (not today).
lines.grammar: Verbs: Identify the main verb and tense/aspect clues.. Prepositions/case: a + article contracts (ao/à). Meaning: 'No, we're not going back today (not today).'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.

lines.text: E aí, gente, cês tão bem?
lines.translation: Hey everyone, how are you all doing?
lines.grammar: Verbs: tão. Prepositions/case: Note preposition-driven case or contractions here.. Meaning: 'Hey everyone, how are you all doing?'. Conjugations mark person/tense; contractions with articles; clitic pronouns may attach.
